mainFeature.title: Live: Amazon Prime Air Launches Drone Delivery in 50 US Cities
mainFeature.excerpt: Amazon expands its Prime Air drone network to 50 U.S. cities, promising under-30-minute deliveries and reshaping the last-mile logistics market. The expansion signals a broader push toward automated fulfillment, raising expectations for faster delivery standards across the e-commerce industry. Analysts say the move could intensify competition among retailers while accelerating regulatory and infrastructure discussions around commercial drone operations. Industry experts note that successful large-scale deployment will depend on airspace coordination, safety standards, and public acceptance.
